name: Amy Johnson
text: This was the best pizza hut I have ever been in. It was super clean. The food was amazing! And the staff was super friendly. Highly recommend it!

name: Chris Arbogast
text: Went to the Weston WV location for a job interview. Met with Shirley who was pleasant to talk to and professional. Been going to the location since I was a kid and I think it is a great resteraunt that serves great food and caters to family needs. I might be working there as a driver, so be sure to tip big...lol.

name: Bryan Cutlip
text: Ordered 18 mild buffalo wings online for delivery. After driver left I descovered they were not buffalo wings but were honey bbq.  I called the mgr she said the driver was out but when he returned she would see if he would bring out right …More

name: Della Lorentz
text: The waitress was really friendly and the manager was really nice

name: Chad Johnson
text: I've been to this Pizza Hut many times throughout the years, but it had been a while until more recently. …More

name: Grace Kyser
text: The absolute worst experience we ever had at a pizza hut. Especially the manager was rude and nasty to us. Don't eat there!! There are far better places around you can get sub-standard pizza!  I would have given it negative stsrs, but unfortunately that option wasn't available.

text: We paid 40$ for our pizza waited 3 hours didn’t even get a 2 liter soda and when the person showed up being rude and pizza was cold and box was wet for some reason

name: brandi jones
text: I don't know where to start with this one. We ordered a six topping pizza but we basically received a cheese only pizza. They forgot the black olives. There was hardly any sauce...and I mean almost no sauce at all. You pick up the cheese …More

name: dibakar sar
text: Wings were okay...pizza was good... service was okay. Left my sunglasses on the table....went straight to the car and was back there in 5 minutes...no customer was present when I left and when I when I went back. The table was clean and I was told they didn't find any sunglasses. Very dissapointed.

name: Anne Freeman
text: Need close caption on TV sets but pizza was great

name: Solaris Sun
text: I ordered pizza 45. Min later it was delivered mind you i was told 25-30 min. My order cost 75$ and one pizza was wrong. So I called was put on hold twice and I asked my pizza be remade. They then told me I had to give the wrong pizza back …More

name: Ricky Whitener
text: Went in for lunch on Saturday was told to seat ourselves.  Then waited 15min and walked out. Poor service.  They weren't even that busy maybe 5 other tables at most.

name: Jon Been
text: Not much of a selection..waited as usual for pizza..no rotation..do some half and halves..love Pizza hut,but sadly not impressed..waitress however was top notch!! Henceforth the 3 stars

name: Stan Hagerman
text: The supreme pizza hand tossed was fantastic best pizza I've had in a long time

name: Rodney Wilkinson
text: Food is typical pizza hut cuisine. I spoke to a couple people that work in the fast food industry. They claim that the pizza hut has more cockroaches than any other restaurant in town

text: The wings are fantastic I get them quite often.  Pan pizza is the best.  Staff always friendly.

name: Darrell Heater
text: I guess you can say they have made a lot of improvements which is good for the consumer but I feel bad for the employees as I know that the regional and corporate management are cutthroat business men and women who see employees as a number …More

text: We arrive here at about 830 pm. When the waitress took our drink order 1unsweet tea 2sweet teas 1 soda 1chocolate milk. Informed they don't serve unsweetened tea so i ordered a sweet instead. A few minutes pasted she returns and theres only …More
